 2024-08822024-07-18GAC, IRCC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCertain Fees in Respect of the Issuance of Replacement Documents (2024 WildÔ¨Åres) Remission Order
PrecisCERTAIN FEES IN RESPECT OF THE ISSUANCE OF THE REPLACEMENT DOCUMENTS (2024 WILDFIRES) REMISSION ORDER in order to remit associated fees for the issuance of replacement Canadian travel documents, permanent resident cards, and certificates of Canadian citizenship that were lost, damaged, destroyed, or rendered inaccessible as a direct result of the 2024 Canadian wildfire season.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: CERTAIN FEES IN RESPECT OF THE ISSUANCE OF THE REPLACEMENT DOCUMENTS (2024 WILDFIRES) REMISSION ORDER in order to remit associated fees for the issuance of replacement Canadian travel documents, permanent resident cards, and certificates of Canadian citizenship that were lost, damaged, destroyed, or rendered inaccessible as a direct result of the 2024 Canadian wildfire season.
